CustomField.formula:
IF( Text(Escalation_Level__c)=='Lead Team Member', '1' , IF( Text(Escalation_Level__c)=='Supervisor', '2' , IF( Text(Escalation_Level__c)=='Manager', '3' , IF( Text(Escalation_Level__c)=='Director', '4' , IF( Text(Escalation_Level__c)=='VP', '5' , '0'
)))))
CustomField.label: System Priority
